009package Ch02_Histograms_Statistics;
010
011import Ch03_Point_Operations.Equalize_Histogram;
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
019import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
020import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * ImageJ plugin which calculates and displays (lists) the histogram of a 8-bit grayscale image. See Sec. 2.3 of [1] for
028 * additional details. Alternatively the histogram could be obtained with ImageJs built-in method (see also
029 * {@link Equalize_Histogram}):
030 * </p>
031 * <pre>
032 * int[] h = ip.getHistogram();</pre>
033 * <p>
034 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
035 * (2022).
036 * </p>
037 *
038 * @author WB
039 * @see HistogramPlot
040 * @see HistogramUtils
041 * @see Show_Histogram
042 */
043public class Compute_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
044
045        private static boolean ShowHistogramPlot = true;
046        private static boolean ListHistogramEntries = false;
047        private static int HISTOGRAM_HEIGHT = 128;
048
049        private ImagePlus im;
050
051        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
052        public Compute_Histogram() {
053                if (noCurrentImage()) {
054                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.IrishManor);
055                }
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
060                this.im = im;
061                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
062        }
063    
064        @Override
065        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
066                if (!runDialog()) {
067                        return;
068                }
069
070                int[] h = new int[256];         // histogram array (initialized to zero values)
071                final int M  = ip.getWidth();
072                final int N = ip.getHeight();
073
074                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
075                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
076                                int i = ip.getPixel(u, v);
077                                h[i] = h[i] + 1;
078                        }
079                }
080                
081                // alternative to the above:
082                // int[] h = ip.getHistogram();
083
084                // ... histogram h[] may now be used
085
086                if (ShowHistogramPlot) {
087                        showHistogram(h, "Histogram of " + im.getShortTitle());
088                }
089                
090                // listing histogram values:
091                if (ListHistogramEntries) {
092                        IJ.log("  i       h[i]");
093                        for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
094                                IJ.log(String.format("%3d: %8d", i, h[i]));
095                        }
096                }
097        }
098
099        void showHistogram(int[] h, String title) {
100                int height = HISTOGRAM_HEIGHT;
101                int hmax = 0;
102                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
103                        hmax = Math.max(hmax,  h[i]);
104                }
105                ByteProcessor hIp = new ByteProcessor(h.length, height);        // create a new image
106                hIp.setColor(255);
107                hIp.fill();
108                hIp.setColor(0);
109                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
110                        int len = (int) Math.round(height * h[i] / hmax);       // scale the max value to window height
111                        hIp.drawLine(i, height, i, height - len);
112                }
113                new ImagePlus(title, hIp).show();       // show the new image on screen
114        }
115
116        private boolean runDialog() {
117                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
118
119                gd.addCheckbox("Show histogram plot", ShowHistogramPlot);
120                gd.addCheckbox("List histogram entries", ListHistogramEntries);
121
122                gd.showDialog();
123                if(gd.wasCanceled())
124                        return false;
125
126                ShowHistogramPlot = gd.getNextBoolean();
127                ListHistogramEntries = gd.getNextBoolean();
128                return true;
129        }
130}
